name: The Mighty Clan
description:
In the city of Adventus there is a big arena where people from all over the world go to fight mortal battles. Some people fight for money and fame, some people fight to test their abilities, and some people fight for helping others. 

Choose between two challengers, Aaron, the mountain warrior, or Nadine, the tundra princess. The goal of both main characters is to reach the top division of the Valiant Arena and beat the Ultimate Champion. Each one of them has personal reasons to do so.

- Form a powerful clan by recruiting up to 10 characters, each one with unique skills and fighting style.
- Upgrade all your equipments to make the arena battles easier.
- Enchant six types of relics for gaining amazing bonuses in battle.
- Embark in dangerous expeditions with your clan to find rare items and even more clan members.
- Manage your items and money with wisdom, for there are a limited number of battles your clan can participate in.
